game.name: Dead Paradise 4
game.description:
The action game based around the genre of shooting as named Dead Paradise 4 is the massive one for the users who love to play online action game in quick and rampant sessions. In the game, you will have to enter into a massive underground lab that is on the brink of disaster due to a disturbed collider that can bring havoc around the earth.

As a saviour, when, you enter into the earth is being provided with ample number of ammunition and especially devised vehicle to easily navigate across the lab in this free action game online provided through and in the intriguing game play.

The vehicle in this free?Dead Paradise 4?game is equipped with firepower as well as missiles to leash an attack over opponent. While heading forward, you will also have to collect missiles. But one thing that you have to keep in your mind that the speed of the game should be the most reasonable one, over speed of the vehicle attacking the enemy could turn your vehicle upside down.

The controls of the lab are simpler and too easier for moving and going backward use upward and downward and for rotating the gun, there left and right arrows help to rotate guns. In order to attack with missiles press space bar.
